setClassMembership

public void setClassMembership(java.lang.String c)
Description copied from interface: I_InputPattern
Sets the name of the class that this input pattern belongs to. For instance if this input pattern represents a binary pulsar, this would be its class.

Specified by:
setClassMembership in interface I_InputPattern
Parameters:
c - the name of the class.

getScoreCount

public int getScoreCount()
Description copied from interface: I_InputPattern
Returns a count of the number of objects that forms an input pattern. The number of objects corresponds to the number of attributes that forms this input pattern.

Specified by:
getScoreCount in interface I_InputPattern
Returns:
0 if there are no attributes, else the number of attributes.

isClassMember

public boolean isClassMember()
Description copied from interface: I_InputPattern
Tests to see if an input pattern belongs to a class. Returns true if the pattern does belong to a class, else false if the class is not known.

Specified by:
isClassMember in interface I_InputPattern
Returns:
true if the class is known, else false.
